paths.path_description: Path to Android Software Development kit. By default stored in ANDROID_HOME env.
Location to .android folder where AVD images are stored. By default stored in ANDROID_SDK_HOME env.
Path to where test process logs will be saved. By default ./output/
Path to root of application under test. (optional)
Directory where .apk files of application under test are stored.
